    • Method Detail

      • merge

        public static void merge​(java.lang.String reactor_name,
                         int currenttime,
                         java.io.File timePath)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Function called by the hydrolysis or methane reactor after finishing the computations. Calls the merge_one_reactor() method to concat all files from all timesteps.
        Parameters:
        reactor_name - Name of the reactor to be merged, e.g. hydrolysis_0
        currenttime - Current time of the simulation
        timePath - Joined path from the reactor name and the current timestep
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • merge_all_hydrolysis

        public static void merge_all_hydrolysis​(java.io.File storage_dir,
                                        java.io.File working_dir,
                                        java.lang.String[] reactor_names)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Function called by the storage element. Merges all files from all hydrolysis reactors and timesteps via merge_hydrolysis_files() and integrates via merge_files_integration(). Also calls merge_storage_outflow() to merge the outflow files of all hydrolysis reactors, which needs to be done separately.
        Parameters:
        storage_dir - Path to the "storage_hydrolysis"
        working_dir - Working directory
        reactor_names - Names of the reactors to be merged
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • merge_all_methane

        public static void merge_all_methane​(java.io.File methane_dir)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Called by the methane element to integrate the outflow files.
        Parameters:
        methane_dir - Path to the methane element
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • update_outputFiles_integration

        public static void update_outputFiles_integration​(java.io.File storage_dir)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Updates the names of the integrated files in the outputFiles from the hydrolysis_storage
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • update_outputFiles

        public static void update_outputFiles​(java.io.File storage_dir)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Removes unwanted files from the outputFiles.lua We use this for example to remove "reactorState.txt" out of the hydrolysis storage, since the values from this textfile cannot be added together (e.g. PH values). They are specific for the hydrolysis reactor and should only be regarded in the according context.
        Parameters:
        storage_dir - Path to the "storage_hydrolysis"
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
